New Records: Adam Zampa finished the day with his best figures in an ODI World Cup match
Key Match Events: Kusal Perera and Pathum Nissanka formed a 125-run opening partnership
Australia lost the toss and struggled to contain the opening partnership
David Warner and Steve Smith fell in the same Dilshan Madushanka over
Josh Inglis scored a career-best ODI knock of 58 from 59 balls
Adam Zampa took four wickets for 47 runs
Pat Cummins took two wickets for 32 runs
Sri Lanka's 9-52 collapse triggered by Zampa and Cummins
Post-Match Reflections: Adam Zampa said he still had room for improvement once he returned to peak physical condition
Zampa said he felt like he could be doing better but it's nice to be on the better end of the result tonight
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was delayed due to wild wind in Lucknow blowing banners down from the roof of the stadium
Sri Lanka has now lost its first three matches, facing an uphill battle to make it past the pool stage
Others: Mitch Marsh recaptured his pre-World Cup form on a proactive start to Australia's innings
Glenn Maxwell came on for a furious cameo late in the game
